history.proof: intros. sauto q: on drew: off depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros a b c H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.

original: intros a b c H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold divP in H3. destruct H3 as [Ha Hb Hc Hd]. unfold divP. split. - intro. apply H1. auto. - intros contra. apply Hb in contra. contradiction. - intros nZb. apply Hc in nZb. apply eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm in nZb. rewrite nZb in H2. contradiction. - intros. apply Hd. auto.
